body.name: PERLESMITH Universal Speaker Stands Height Adjustable Extend 33.3” to 45.1” Holds Satellite Speakers & Bookshelf Speakers up to 11lbs-1 Pair PSSS2 Black
features: 【ACHIEVE THE BEST SOUND】 Height adjustable speaker stands from 33.3” to 45.1” can help you get the best sound out of your speakers by creating a listening "sweet spot" when you are seated. Placing your bookshelf speakers on the appropriate height speaker stand can also reduce reflections to give you a purer and more clear sound. Allows tilting your speaker 0-5° in all directions, directing the sounds towards you for optimal listening experience.

【UNIVERSAL STAND ADAPTS TO YOUR SPEAKERS】 The floor speaker stands can fit a variety of different types of small satellite & bookshelf speakers weighing up to 11 lbs. Speaker stands pair compatible with Klipsch, Sony, Yamaha, Harmon Kardon, Edifier, Polk, Samsung, Bose, Vizio, JBL, PA DJ, and other speakers.

【 STABILITY & STURDINESS】 This surround sound speaker stand is equipped with non-slip pads that allow you to use it safely and securely on different types of floors. The recast pole and solid base provide double protection for your speakers, so your speakers will be safe.

【HIDE WIRES & EASILY INSTALLATION】 The PSSS2 smart speaker stands come with a large hole (1.18"H x 0.59"W) to manage your cables for a clean and tidy appearance. You can easily pan the top plate 180 degrees from 5.91 to 11.22 inches to fit your various speakers of different sizes.

【ALL-IN-ONE】Speaker stands pair include the standard mounting hardware kit in the package. We provide a worry-free shopping experience service, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact our 24-hour customer service for help. We will give you a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is heavier than I expected and sturdy as can be
reviews.reviewText: The stands were very easy to put together. I was surprised how heavy they were. It made them very stable once the speakers were installed. They don't take up a lot of room and are very attractive. You barely notice them. The adjustable height is great as you want the speakers above your ears when sitting. Besides that, they are a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw many people complaining about these speaker stands so I wasn’t expecting too much. They were easy to assemble and sturdy. Had no problem running wire through the stand and they seem pretty sturdy even on my carpet. I installed my old Bose bookshelves speakers ( which weigh about 10 lbs) and it’s a solid fit. These extend to just above my sofa which makes them great for my rear surround speaker setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Do not use with heavier speakers.
reviews.reviewText: These stands just barely reach the height required for adequate monitoring while sitting in my desk chair. I use the Rokit 8" monitors, and they seem to push the limits of what these stands can support. The stand barely extends to the width of my speaker, and the weight of the speaker overwhelms it. The stand buckled when I first set up the speakers, and now permanently stands with a lean when mounted. It's not the best construction, but in the end, it does work. It would likely be great for a speaker with a 5" cone, but the 8" cone is just pushing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not fancy, but very secure, stable and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: These won't win any awards in terms of looks, but they have been excellent with regard to functionality. It's made of decently heavy gauge metal, and the base is more than large enough to provide a very stable platform. I especially like the adjustability of the speaker holders. It's easy to set up and holds the speakers firmly.All the parts are packed well, and there were zero scratches/dents on any of the parts. Assembly is quick and easy. I picked these up on Prime Day when they were discounted, but even at the regular price I'd rate them as an excellent value. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Do not work with Sonos Era 100
reviews.reviewText: These stands are well-made, easy to assemble, and very sturdy. They work with a wide range of speakers, but do not work with the Sonos Era 100. The base plate on which the speakers rest is too large for the Era 100. The speaker will only be secure if it is gripped tightly by the clamps of the base plate, and the Era 100s profile is too small to be secured by the clamps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made - Adjustable
reviews.reviewText: Got these to support a couple of Sony speakers. The speakers don't exactly fit these stands, but the stands were adjustable enough so I could make them work. These have a good range for height adjustments and the speaker platform has a nice, adjustable grip with rubber padding. The only problem I had was I could not get my cables to run on the inside of the stand tubing. If you're running speaker wire it might work for you, but if your cables have prefabricated ends on them like mine do, there's just no way it will fit inside the tubes, but you can wire tie your cables along the backside out of sight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These speaker stands were more than I excepted
reviews.reviewText: At the price point I was not expecting much of a speaker stand and with Amazons return policy I thought I would give them a try. The assembly instructions are easy to read and the stands went together with out a hitch. My Polk Audio rear channel speakers fit into them perfectly and the stands hold the speakers securely in place. Some of reviews were saying the stands were unstable, but really once the speakers are installed and placed, they seems to work fine to me, and besides, I am not planning on walking up to them and kicking them, I just need them to hold the speakers at the correct height. I bought them over the holidays on sale and for what i paid for them, You will not hear me complaining about what I got for what i paid for. What a decent set of stands for the money !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great! Simple to install
reviews.reviewText: 4 stars only because I wish they were a tad more sturdy when extended using them for M audio BX5’s… perfect!
soportes de excelente calidad, muy adecuadas para las bocinas de estanteria, ademas que se les puede la posicion requerida para optimizar la escucha de las mismas

I find these speaker stands to be great qaulity for the price. I am having no issues with them. They are well built with almost all metal construction (very little plastic). They are sturdy and do not wobble and the telescoping mechanism locks very tight and hold the weight of my speakers just fine. I know some people have complained about wobble and or the hight adjustment not holding but that has not been my expierience. Maybe the issues have been fixed with their recent stands. Anyways I love them and do recomend them for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cuidado com a taxação do produto
reviews.reviewText: O pedestal é muito bom. Discreto, fácil de montar e atendeu às expectativas. Porém eu paguei quase o dobro de preço na taxação do produto. Algo que o vendedor não informa na pagina do mesmo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2022

reviews.reviewText: Cumplen con su función, los uso con mis monitores krk 5" y los soporta pero son un poco frágiles, ahora que ya los tengo optaría por otra opción más estable
